creator: June Gaming
descriptionHtml:
Devils Amongst Us is a real-time online multiplayer game with 4-10 players in a haunted mansion.
Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil".

► Story-line Evil spirits have been residing in a huge Mansion for many years. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini tasks inside the mansion, but beware of these spirits who will sabotage your task. The game is similar to werewolf & mafia that you have been playing all this while.
► GamePlay 🎮 All the players enter the haunted mansion and a few get possessed by the Devil to play the role of imposter in the game. Every player will have a task to complete.
► Vote There is a voting round after every dead body reported or when an emergency call is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

► Devils Goal Devils win the game by eliminating the rest of the Silly's
► Sillys Goal Complete all the mini tasks inside the mansion or Find and Vote out Devils

Silly Universe
Customize your Silly with many different skins and hat combinations

Coming Soon
There are 3 modes in Devil Amongst Us.
1. Original (Social Deduction)
2. Hide n Seek (Coming Soon)
3. Cops N Robbers - Jail Break (Coming Soon)
We also have Voice Chat and Game Settings Customization coming shortly !

Install Now for our early Beta !
We are working on many new features, new maps and new game modes which we will be releasing in subsequent weeks.
Please share your feedback with our team via email or via our social channels !

Till then, Play Along with us in the Silly Universe !
Find and Eliminate the Devils Amongst Us !

title: Devil Amongst Us - Social Deduction + Hide & Seek

creator: June Gaming
descriptionHtml:
Devils Amongst Us is a real-time online multiplayer game played with 4-10 players in a haunted mansion.
Play as a "Silly" or a "Devil"
We support 3 modes
1. A Social Deduction - Murder Mystery
2. Hide N Seek.
3. JailBreak / Cops and Robbers (Coming Soon)

We now support inbuilt Voice Chat in all Hosted Private Games.

► Story-line Evil spirits have been residing in a huge Mansion for many years. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini tasks inside the mansion, but beware of these impostors who will sabotage your task. The game is similar to werewolf & mafia social deduction games that you have been playing all this while.
► GamePlay 🎮 All the players enter the haunted mansion and a few get possessed by the Devil to play the role of imposter in the game. Every player will have a task to complete.
► Vote There is a voting round after every dead body reported or when an emergency call is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

► Devils Goal Devils win the game by eliminating the rest of the Silly's
► Sillys Goal Complete all the mini tasks inside the mansion or Find and Vote out the Devils Among Us in the Murder Mystery Mode. Check for Suspects, Vote and Eliminate Imposters. Beware Impostors could be pretending to be innocent !

Silly Universe
Customize your Silly with many different skins and hat combinations

Game Modes
There are 3 modes in Devil Amongst Us.
1. Murder Mystery (Social Deduction)
2. Hide n Seek
3. Jailbreak (Cops & Robbers) which is coming soon
We also support multiple Game Settings customizations for Private Matches

Voice Chat
We now support Voice Chat in all Private Games
We support the following Modes for Voice Chat
Hide & Seek (Always On)
Murder Mystery (Social Deduction)
- Murder Mystery (Social Deduction) Supports 3 Voice Chat Modes
1. Default Meetings Only (Everyone can speak at meetings, Ghost can only listen)
2. Murder Mystery Mode (Everyone can speak always, Ghosts can listen but not speak)
3. Always On (Everyone Abides by an Honor Code)

Coming Soon
Cops N Robbers - Jail Break
Play as Sillys trying to break out of Prison or Play as Cops keeping the Silly’s in Prison.


Install Now!
Thanks for your overwhelming feedback.
We are working on new features, new maps and new game modes releasing shortly.

Please share your feedback with our team via email or via our social channels!
Email: help@supergaming.com

Till then, Find and Eliminate the Devils Amongst Us ! or our new Hide and Seek

- From all the Silly’s at SuperGaming

title: Devil Amongst Us + Hide & Seek with Voice Chat

creator: June Gaming
descriptionHtml:
😈 Devils Amongst Us is a real-time online multiplayer game played with 4-10 players in a haunted mansion. Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil".

► Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
Murder Mystery which is a social deduction game
Hide N Seek
Jailbreak or Cops and Robbers which is coming soon
We also allow you to customize your Game Settings for a Private Match

► Voice Chat 🎙️ We now support Voice Chat in all Private Rooms
Hide and Seek supports an always On Voice Chat. Tell your friends when the devil is near by.
Murder Mystery supports 3 Voice Modes 🎧
1. Default Meetings Only (Everyone can speak at meetings, Ghosts can only listen)
2. Murder Mystery Mode (Everyone can speak always, Ghosts can listen but not speak)
3. Always On (Everyone Abides by an Honor Code)

► Story-line 🏰 Evil spirits have been residing in a huge Mansion for many years. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini tasks inside the mansion, but beware of these impostors who will sabotage your task. The game is similar to werewolf & mafia that you have been playing all this while.
► GamePlay 🎮 All the players enter the haunted mansion and a few get possessed by the Devil to play the role of imposter in the game. Every player will have a task to complete.
► Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body reported or when an emergency call is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

► Devils Goal 😈 Devils win the game by eliminating the rest of the Silly's
► Sillys Goal 🎯 Complete all the mini tasks inside the mansion or Find and Vote out Devils Among Us in the Murder Mystery Mode.
► Identify Suspects 🕵️‍♀️ See who is on Sus behavior and see who is a genuine player.
► Vote out Imposters 🤔 Impostors should be voted out of the game before time runs out. Be mindful to not vote out a Silly.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with many different skins and hat combinations

Coming Soon 🔜
👮 Cops N Robbers - Jail Break
In our Cops and Robbers Mode, we have eight prisoners and two cops.
Prisoners do tasks to try and escape the Prison while Cops seek them and keep them locked up again. Will the Cops succeed or will the prisoners escape the Jail. Play to Find Out in our new mode coming soon.

Let's Play Devils Amongst Us ! with our classic Social Deduction Game where you identify Suspects, Eliminate Imposters or our all new new Hide and Seek mode where you chase and seek other players.

Install Now !
Please share your feedback with our team via email or via our social channels !
Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response to our game.

title: Devil Amongst Us: Hide and seek in mystery mansion

creator: SuperGaming
descriptionHtml:
😈 Devils Among Us is a real-time online multiplayer game, best played with 4-12 players in a Haunted Mansion or Prison. Create your own Silly Avatar and experience the fun of playing your favorite childhood games like Jail Break (New Update!) and Hide n Seek with your friends in a fresh new take. And it gets even better - we have voice chat and emoticons!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
New Update - Jailbreak Mode where you outwit cops and escape the prison with your friends.
• Hide and seek - Find the imposter among your friends! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you.
• Murder Mystery - A social deduction game, don't forget all your friends are now suspects! Can you really trust them?

We also allow you to customize your Game Settings for a Private Match with friends

Voice Chat 🎙️
Devil Amongst Us supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.

Story-line
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
In our new JailBreak Mode, prisoners do fun mini-tasks to try and escape the Prison while Cops seek them and keep them locked up again. Players can also help release their friends who get captured. Will the Cops succeed or will the prisoners escape the Jail? Play to Find Out in our new JailBreak mode.

GamePlay 🎮 All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.


🏰 Murder Mystery - Evil spirits have been residing in a huge Mansion for many years. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery. But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task. Hide-and-seek murder mystery game for all murder mystery games lovers!

GamePlay 🎮 All the players enter the haunted mansion and a few get possessed by the Devil to play the role of an imposter in the game. Every player will have a task to complete in the mystery mansion. Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? Forge new friendships with global players or test your existing bonds!

Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Devils Goal 😈 Devils win the game by eliminating the rest of the Silly's by playing hide-and-seek.
Silly Goal 🎯 Complete all the mini-tasks inside the mansion or Find and Vote out Devils Among Us in the Murder Mystery Mode.
Identify Suspects 🕵️‍♀️ See who is on Sus behavior and see who is a genuine player.
Vote out Imposter🤔 Impostor should be voted out of the game before time runs out. Be mindful to not vote out a Silly.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with many different skins and hat combinations. Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat! Work together with players to win the game and get bragging rights!

Install Now!
Please share your feedback for our Jail Break game with our team via email or via our social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response to our Murder Mystery & Hide N Seek games.
descriptionShort: Join the Silly Universe and play the new Jailbreak mode with Voice Chat.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're excited to announce that we now have Spectate support in the game. Don't feel like playing and want to just watch your friends play?
Join the game as a spectator.We also have a maze feature in the game which you can play in Murder Mystery or Jail break. Compete against everyone to reach the finish line first!
Want to chat with Silly's from other countries? Silly world now provides chat outside the game lobbies so that you can make new friends and play
the new features.

title: Devil Amongst Us: New Jail Break mode + VoiceChat

creator: SuperGaming
descriptionHtml:
😈 Silly World is a real-time online multiplayer game, best played with 4-12 players in a Haunted Mansion or Prison. Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil" in Hide N Seek & Murder Mystery mode & as a “Cop” or a “Robber” in the new Jail Break Mode. It gets even better - we have voice chat and emoticons!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
Jailbreak - Outwit the cops and escape the prison with your friend.
Hide and seek - Find the imposter among your friends! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you.
Murder Mystery - A social deduction game, don't forget all your friends are now suspects! Can you really trust them?

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly World supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race (New Update) - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Activate the Maze race in Murder Mystery or Jail Break Mode. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Spectate Mode (New Update) - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and watch the action unfold, get to see who’s plotting against who, where the last person was killed and of course who’s the Devil and who’s the Silly.

GamePlay 🎮
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.
Who do you think will succeed ? Cops or Robbers? Play to Find Out in our new JailBreak mode.

🏰 Murder Mystery
All the players enter the haunted mansion as a Silly, while a few get possessed by the Devil who has been residing in a mansion for many years. Possessed Sillys’ play the role of a devil in the game. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task.
Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Hide N Seek
Who hasn’t played Hide ‘n Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! We’re bringing Hide N Seek to Silly World and the best part about this is that we all already know the rules! As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with different skins and hat combinations. Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat! Work together with players to win the game and get bragging rights!

Install Now!
Please share your feedback for our Jail Break game with our team via email or via our social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response to our Murder Mystery & Hide N Seek games.

title: Silly World - Devil Amongst Us

creator: SuperGaming
descriptionHtml:
😈 Silly World also known as Devil Amongst Us is a real-time online multiplayer game, best played with 12 players in a Haunted Mansion or Prison.
Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil" in Hide N Seek & Murder Mystery mode & as a “Cop” or a “Robber” in the new Jail Break Mode.
It gets even better - we have voice chat and emoticons!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
Jailbreak - Outwit the cops and escape the prison with your friend.
Hide and seek - Find the imposter among your friends! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you.
Murder Mystery - A social deduction game, don't forget all your friends are now suspects! Can you really trust them?
Battle Royale - Come play our new Season of Battle Royale Events

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly World supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race (New Update) - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Spectate Mode - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and watch the action unfold,you can now see who’s the Devil and who’s the Silly.

GamePlay 🎮
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.
Who do you think will succeed ? Cops or Robbers? Play to Find Out in our new JailBreak mode.

🏰 Murder Mystery
All the players enter the haunted mansion as a Silly, while a few get possessed by the Devil who has been residing in a mansion for many years. Possessed Sillys’ play the role of a devil in the game. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task.
Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Hide N Seek
Who hasn’t played Hide ‘n Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! We’re bringing Hide N Seek to Silly World and the best part about this is that we all already know the rules! As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with different skins and hat combinations.
Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat!

Install Now!
Please share your feedback for our Jail Break game with our team via email or via our social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response to our Pre Registration.

😈 Silly Royale also known as Silly World / Devil Amongst Us is a real-time online multiplayer game, best played with 12 players in a Haunted Mansion or Prison.
Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil" in Hide N Seek & Murder Mystery mode & as a “Cop” or a “Robber” in the new Jail Break Mode.
It gets even better - we have voice chat and emoticons!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
Jailbreak - Outwit the cops and escape the prison with your friend.
Hide and seek - Find the imposter among your friends! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you.
Murder Mystery - A social deduction game, don't forget all your friends are now suspects! Can you really trust them?
Squid Royale Games - Play Season 3 of Squid Royale Games - Glass Bridge, Marbles, HoneyComb/Dalgona, Tug of War & Red Light Green Light! Race against your friends & unlock cool skins.

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly World supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Spectate Mode - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and watch the action unfold, you can now see who’s the Devil and who’s the Silly.

GamePlay 🎮
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.
Who do you think will succeed ? Cops or Robbers? Play to Find Out in our new JailBreak mode.

🏰 Murder Mystery
All the players enter the haunted mansion as a Silly, while a few get possessed by the Devil who has been residing in a mansion for many years. Possessed Sillys’ play the role of a devil in the game. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task.
Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Hide N Seek
Who hasn’t played Hide ‘n Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! We’re bringing Hide N Seek to Silly Royale and the best part about this is that we all already know the rules! As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with different skins and hat combinations.
Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat!

Install Now!
Please share your feedback for our Squid Royale games with our team via email or via our social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response to our Pre Registration.
descriptionShort: Find the Devil Among Us, Hide n Seek, Jailbreak, Squid Games with Voice Chat !

Team up with your squad of 4 and play against the other 3 squads. Try to survive against the Devil's electric music with Floor is Lava!

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly World supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Spectate Mode - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and watch the action unfold, you can now see who’s the Devil and who’s the Silly.

GamePlay 🎮
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.
Who do you think will succeed ? Cops or Robbers? Play to Find Out in our new JailBreak mode.

🏰 Murder Mystery
All the players enter the haunted mansion as a Silly, while a few get possessed by the Devil who has been residing in a mansion for many years. Possessed Sillys’ play the role of a devil in the game. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task.
Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Hide N Seek
Who hasn’t played Hide ‘n Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! We’re bringing Hide N Seek to Silly Royale and the best part about this is that we all already know the rules! As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with different skins and hat combinations.
Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat!

Install Now!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our 3 Modes
Jailbreak - Outwit the cops and escape the prison with your friend.
Hide and seek - Find the imposter among your friends! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you.
Murder Mystery - A social deduction game, don't forget all your friends are now suspects! Can you really trust them?
Devil's Playground - The Devil is Back! Yes, you heard us right!
Team up with your squad of 4 and play against the other 3 squads. Try to survive against the Devil's electric music with Floor is Lava!

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly World supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Spectate Mode - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and watch the action unfold, you can now see who’s the Devil and who’s the Silly.

GamePlay 🎮
👮 Jail Break - Cops and Robbers
All Silly’s enter the prison and get selected as Cops or Robbers. In a classic Cops vs Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game.
Who do you think will succeed ? Cops or Robbers?

🏰 Murder Mystery
All the players enter the haunted mansion as a Silly, while a few get possessed by the Devil who has been residing in a mansion for many years. Possessed Sillys’ play the role of a devil in the game. The only way to set the mansion free from these spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Everyone is a suspect now, Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task.
Vote ✅ There is a voting round after every dead body is reported or when an emergency meeting is made. Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Hide N Seek
Who hasn’t played Hide ‘n Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! We’re bringing Hide N Seek to Silly Royale and the best part about this is that we all already know the rules! As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Silly Universe 🌏 Customize your Silly with different skins and hat combinations.
Hide-and-seek, mystery game and Jailbreak with voice chat!

Install Now!
Please share your feedback for our Devil's playground games with our team via email or via our social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com

❤️ Thank you for your overwhelming response about our game.

Vote ✅: Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

👮 Jail Break - Cops vs Robbers Outwit the cops and escape the prison with your friends. In a classic Cops and Robbers game, Silly’s selected as Cops will need to capture all Robbers before they escape the Prison. Robbers would need to work together and complete all the mini-games to Jail break. Beware! If Cops catch you helping your robber inmates, they will bash you up in the game. Who do you think will succeed? Cops or Robbers?

Features:
Customized Settings for a Private Match with friends
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly Royale supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Spectate Mode 🍿 - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and find out who’s the Devil 😈.

Silly Universe 🌏: Hatch an egg pod 🥚& Adopt your own Silly pet 🐉. They are not just pets, they are pets with Super Powers. They protect you, while you are in danger.
Also, Customize your Silly with unique cool skins and hat combinations.

Install Now!

creator: SuperGaming
descriptionHtml:
😈 Silly Royale is a fun real-time online multiplayer game featuring an exciting "Voice Chat" option, making it even more fun with friends! Play across multiple game modes and enjoy seamless communication while strategizing.
And it gets even better—adopt your own Silly Pet 🐶 and take it with you across all game modes!

Create your own Silly Avatar and get selected to play as a "Silly" or a "Devil" in Hide N Seek & Murder Mystery modes. Compete to survive in the challenging event, Super Royale!

Game Modes 🕹️ Choose between playing our amazing game modes
Super Royale 🎭 Step into the ultimate Super Royale challenge and fight to be the last survivor! Compete in five intense game modes—Red Light, Green Light, Dalgona, Tug of War, Marbles, and Glass Bridge where every move matters. Play as a solo competitor in fast-paced online multiplayer matches, battling against other players to survive and outsmart your opponents. But beware - one mistake, and the guards will eliminate you. Are you ready to test your limits and prove how long you can survive in this epic Super Royale challenge?

Hide and seek 🕵🏻‍♀️ - Who hasn’t played Hide & Seek as a kid? And if you haven’t, history always repeats itself! Complete all mini-tasks and use hiding spots to escape the Devil who is coming for you. As a Silly, you have to find a spot to hide and make sure the Devil doesn’t catch you. As the Devil, make sure you get every last Silly on the map! Sounds like fun? INVITE YOUR FRIENDS and get right to it.

Murder Mystery - Mystery Mansion 🏰 - A social deduction game where all your friends are suspect now. Who will you trust? But beware of the imposter who will sabotage your task. The only way to set the haunted mansion free from these impostors/spirits is by completing all the mini-tasks inside the mansion and solving the murder mystery.
Vote ✅: Vote to evict the Devil, but be careful not to evict an Innocent Silly since you will be helping the Devils win the game.

Features:
Customized Game Settings for a Private Match with friends 👥
Voice Chat 🎙️ - Silly Royale supports an always-on Voice Chat feature. Tell your friends when the devil/cops are nearby and help each other to win the game.
Maze Race👿 - Escape the Maze and don’t be the last one out! You get ejected if you are the last person to complete the maze, regardless if you’re the silly or the Devil. Remember, when you’re the devil and you activate this, you put yourself at risk. Make this decision wisely, don’t make a ‘silly’ mistake...
Avatars & Emotes 😎- Why be boring when you can unlock and equip cool avatars for your characters? Express your personality with fun emotes for your character with cool skins and hat combinations.
Spectate Mode 🍿 - Waiting for your friends, while they’re having fun playing and all you’re doing is staring at the main menu screen? No more waiting in the lobby! Join your friend’s game as a spectator and find out who’s the Devil😈.

Silly Universe 🌏: Hatch an egg pod 🥚& Adopt your own Silly pet 🐶. They are not just pets, they are pets with Super Powers. They protect you, while you are in danger.

Download and Play Now!❤️
Please share your feedback with our team via email or social channels! Reach out to the dev team with your suggestions and requests at help@supergaming.com
descriptionShort: Play Among Us, Hide & Seek, and survive multiplayer challenges with Voice Chat!

Re-introduced voice chat in private matches.
